# App Templates

Available app templates:

- [hello-world](./hello-world)
- [d1-drizzle](./d1-drizzle)
- [do-sql-drizzle](./do-sql-drizzle)


To create an application using templates:

::: code-group
```sh [npm]
npm create workery
```
```sh [yarn]
yarn create workery
```
```sh [pnpm]
pnpm create workery
```
:::
